name: Vietjet Aviation Academy (VJAA)
about: Vietjet Aviation Academy (VJAA) is a state-of-the-art training center established in 2012, initially as Vietjet Training Center. Located in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, VJAA is jointly operated by Vietjet and Airbus Group, adhering to European standards. As an IATA Regional Training Partner, VJAA offers industry-expert designed courses, including ab-initio pilot training with a 100% job placement guarantee by Vietjet Air. The academy is equipped with modern classrooms, Wi-Fi-connected meeting rooms, and a range of recreational facilities such as a basketball court, tennis court, swimming pool, and soccer pitch. VJAA is committed to investment and research in aviation technology, ensuring global credibility and quality in aviation training. For more information, contact VJAA at vjaa.recruit@vietjetair.com or +84 91198 4873. VJAA is dedicated to providing top-tier aviation education and training.
services:
["FLIGHT CREW TRAINING PROGRAM
CABIN CREW TRAINING PROGRAM
AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE TECHNICIAN TRAINING PROGRAM
FLIGHT DISPATCHER TRAINING PROGRAM
GROUND OPERATIONS PERSONNEL TRAINING PROGRAM
COMMERCIAL STAFF TRAINING PROGRAM"]
